title: Interpretation of seeing a seal or stamp in a dream in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a seal in a dream: A seal in a dream indicates position, money, and prestige. Imam al-Sadiq explained that a seal in a dream refers to five things that indicate highness, prestige, savings, money, and blessings. Interpretation of seeing a seal in a dream by Ibn Shahin. Ibn Shaheen interpreted seeing a seal or seal in a dream to indicate goodness. What is coming for the dreamer. Whoever sees this in a dream and the king gave him the seal. This dream indicates that he will reach great status, prestige and eminence. This may indicate the abundance of livelihood and money that will come to him, God willing. The interpretation of seeing a seal in an unmarried girl’s dream is one for the unmarried girl who sees a seal on a piece of paper. White in a dream, it means entering a field of work or finding a new job. And the dream stamp on the passport indicates travel or success. As for seeing the stamp on official papers in a dream, such as a driver’s license or card, this dream indicates achieving What you want or the end of the things that were worrying you. Interpretation of seeing a seal in a dream for a married woman. A married woman who sees a seal in a dream indicates an abundance of money. If one sees a seal in her husband’s hand or a seal on his hand or palm, then this dream is a sign of abundance of sustenance and money. It can be seen A seal in a married woman’s dream is a sign that she will achieve what she wants in her world. Get rid of the things that worry you. Interpretation of seeing a seal in a pregnant woman’s dream: A pregnant woman who sees a seal in a dream could be a sign of the approaching date of birth. A seal in a pregnant woman’s dream shows what she desires. Interpretation of seeing a seal for a man in a dream: A man who sees a seal in a dream, this dream indicates his high status among people. Seeing a seal in a man’s dream could mean that he is a person who is good at driving cars. The interpretation also varies depending on the material from which the ring is made. Seeing a ring made of silver or Iron indicates the acquisition of money. We see a prominent stamp in a dream that indicates influence and power. You also see seals in the shape of an eagle or with the word His Majesty and the name of the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace, written on them. Therefore, we have provided you with all possible interpretations of seeing a seal in a dream. Anyone who has a vision and wants to explain it We take your comments at the end of the article and will give you the explanation as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of a dream about someone killing my mother in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about killing my mother in a dream. We will learn in the following lines the interpretation of a dream about killing my mother in a dream according to the interpretations of scholars and interpreters and not personal interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about someone killing my mother in a dream. Interpretation of a dream that someone kills my mother in a dream. The death of a mother can indicate things that are not Good, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If the dreamer sees the killing of the mother, this may lead to the destruction of the dreamer’s life, and God knows the unseen. When he sees a young man killing his mother, it may indicate small actions that the dreamer is interested in, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my brother who wants to die in a dream. Interpretation Dreams for my brother who wants to die in a dream. We did not find specific explanations for this, except that seeing someone chasing you and wanting to kill you and you failed to escape may indicate a failure in worship, and God knows best. When you see someone chasing the dreamer and killing him, this may lead to unpleasant things, and God knows best. If I saw someone who wanted to kill me and he managed to escape, so this may lead to victory over your enemy, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about shooting a bullet in the heart in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about shooting a bullet in the heart Where if the dreamer sees himself being shot in a dream, this may be evidence of the good that he will achieve And God knows the unseen. When you see a gunshot wound in a dream, it can be a sign of kindness, and God knows best. Also, seeing a gunshot wound may indicate the sustenance of the murdered person, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about seeing someone killing his son in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing someone killing his son in a dream could be A sign of injustice, and God knows the unseen. Killing the father expresses injustice, and God knows best. When the dreamer sees the killing of his son in a dream, this may be a sign of cruelty, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees the killing of the son, it expresses committing sins, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about someone committing suicide in a dream. Interpretation of dreams for a person. He commits suicide in a dream. Suicide can be a sign of trouble, and God knows everything. If the dreamer sees someone killing himself in a dream, this may indicate a problem, but it will end, and God knows the unseen. Suicide can also express poverty, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees suicide in a dream, it may be A sign of suffering, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream of being killed by blood bullets in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of being killed by bullets without blood in a dream. Being killed by bullets can indicate goodness, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If the dreamer sees himself being shot in a dream, this may be a sign of blessing, and God knows the unseen. When a girl sees someone other than A married woman shoots herself in a dream, this could be a sign of kindness and living, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a married man sees himself being shot in a dream, this may be a sign of sustenance, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about killing an old woman in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about killing an old woman in a dream. That it leads to goodness, God willing. If the dreamer sees the killing of an old woman in a dream, it could be a sign of getting rid of problems, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees the killing of an old woman in

title: Interpretation of prayer in a dream and details of its meanings by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Learn in the Encyclopedia about the interpretation of prayer in a dream in detail. The symbol of prayer in a dream is one of the common religious symbols in the world of dreams, which prompts dreamers to recognize its effects in reality, and prayer is one of the five pillars of Islam and the religious duties that a Muslim is committed to. God is approaching and seeing this dream indicates the coming of goodness and livelihood for the dreamer. What did dream interpreters say about the meaning of this vision? The meaning of seeing a dream about prayer in a dream. If the dreamer dreams that he is performing the dawn prayer in a dream, this indicates success, abundant sustenance, and salvation from danger. As for seeing the noon prayer in a dream, this is a sign that he will achieve what he wants in reality. From Among the praiseworthy symbols of seeing prayer in a dream is that it indicates overcoming the obstacles that the dreamer is going through. If the dreamer is suffering from an illness in reality, then seeing the noon prayer in a dream portends an improvement in his health. If the dreamer sees himself performing the noon prayer in front of the Kaaba, this indicates However, he enjoys a high status. If he sees the Isha prayer in a dream, this is a sign that he earns a lot of money and achieves what he aspires to. Seeing the Isha prayer in a dream for the dreamer indicates the end of worries and the arrival of peace and comfort for the dreamer. If the dreamer sees that he is praying the Maghrib prayer and prostrating a lot, This indicates that he will earn a lot of money. In the case of a dream about the evening prayer, this indicates the stability of the dreamer’s life, and if the prayer is in Ramadan, this indicates the dreamer’s desire to repent to God. Seeing the evening prayer in a dream shows the extent of the dreamer’s commitment to maintaining kinship ties. Interpretation of a dream about praying in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin explained that seeing prayer in a dream indicates the satisfaction of the dreamer’s needs in reality, and God knows best. Seeing prayer in a dream is one of the visions that indicate the arrival of comfort and ease for the dreamer. When the dreamer sees himself performing the obligatory prayer in a dream, this indicates His commitment to performing his duties. When you dream of performing the Sunnah prayer, this is evidence of his good condition in reality. Seeing the prayer facing the Qiblah symbolizes the dreamer’s commitment to obeying God and enjoying good morals. As for praying in a direction opposite to the Qiblah, this indicates the corruption of the Prophet’s morals and the commission of his forbidden things. If the dreamer sees that he He prays in the mosque, this indicates his good condition and the fulfillment of his purpose. When you dream that you are praying on the farm, this means that the dreamer will achieve what he wants and stop his worries. If the dreamer sees that he is praying on the chair because of his illness, this symbolizes how diligent the dreamer is in his work. If the dreamer sees That he prays on a chair without being sick, this indicates the theft of money and illness in reality. Interpretation of a dream about prayer by Ibn ShaheenIbn Shaheen interpreted seeing a dream about praying as a sign of kindness and abundance of livelihood. If the dreamer sees himself praying in a dream among a group of men and women, this means that He will assume a leadership position. When the dreamer sees in a dream that he is kneeling for a long time during prayer, this vision is good for him and indicates relief from anxiety. In case the dreamer dreams of a virtual prayer, it means that he will gain a lot

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about a bird in the hand according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a bird in one’s hand is one of the dreams that require a feeling of comfort, because birds are one of the soul’s favorite birds, and watching them fly in the vast space gives the dreamer a sense of freedom and freedom, so what if he saw that in his country? Hands, this is what we learn about its interpretation in our current topic. Interpretation of a dream about a bird in one’s hand Interpretation of a dream about a bird in one’s hand? If a person sees in his dream that he is holding a bird in his hands and aspires to achieve a certain goal, then he must be reassured that he is able to achieve it and is very close to achieving happiness and satisfaction Seeing a single girl who has many ambitions and dreams that she wants to achieve is a sign of goodness for her and the presence of abilities that make her able to be in a wonderful position and achieve everything she aspires to, as long as she does so. So. It is in line with the goal of searching and striving. However, if the dreamer catches the bird after hunting it illegally, then this dream is evidence of a repulsive trait in the dreamer that makes him constantly think and plan with others with the desire to make them make mistakes and then exploit them to his advantage. His advantage, which makes him an outcast in society. Seeing someone releasing the bird after it is in his hand is a good sign that he has many ideas in his head that will help him build his future and he will try to achieve them based on his belief in his abilities. Releasing the bird to fly again and looking at it with admiration reflects the dreamer’s positivity He does not stop at any obstacle on his way, but he always searches for solutions to his problems and does not stand idly by. Seeing him and enjoying the beauty of his colors while he is in the hands of the fortuneteller indicates that there is a happy event waiting for him according to what he wishes to happen, whether it is childbirth if he is married or joining a job. Or marry a beautiful girl. Seeing an unmarried young man who wants to quickly climb the career ladder so that he can have a high status among his friends, and having the skills and abilities that make him able to do so, is a sign that he has obtained the position that he is seriously looking for. Who is suffering from financial discomfort Or psychological, his dream is a good indication that he will emerge from it safely, and continue his life energetically and actively without the slightest disturbance. What is the interpretation of a dream about a bird in the hand of Ibn Sirin? Interpretations of this dream depend on what the dreamer does with the bird and how it fell into his hand. He may chase him in a dream, or see his torment, or think and contemplate the power of God in his creation, etc. If someone sees him in the prime of life and paving his future on the path of knowledge, work, or merchants and finds himself standing, a bird falling into his hand, then by the grace of God he will achieve his goal and achieve His goals. He achieves his goals in less time than planned. The Imam also said: Seeing him on many occasions is a sign of a righteous caliph and an obedient wife who does not disobey her Lord or her husband, and takes care of the affairs of her home and children without the slightest fault. But if he sees the bird dead on the ground, he must be very careful, He may find many obstacles in front of him, which may be a reason for breaking his will and discouraging him. Within the framework prescribed by God Almighty. Pursuing the dreamer and capturing him is evidence of his activity and determination to achieve his goals. But if he comes to him without looking for him, then there is a person...

title: Interpretation of a dream about cutting hair for a divorced woman

preview.html: It is actually about hair, but we will talk about seeing a haircut, whether it is long or short, and according to each case, it will be explained through this article from our website. Interpretation of a dream about cutting hair in a dream for an unmarried girl. It is mentioned in some interpretations that seeing hair cut in a girl’s dream The unmarried woman. It appears that it is related to the psychological state she is going through and wants to get out of it. Some dream interpreters reported that the dream of cutting hair is the maneuvers of an unmarried girl. It indicates the presence of thoughts that are disturbing her life. Cutting long hair in the dream of the unmarried girl indicates the developments that will pass. In fact. Some dream interpreters differ in the dream of cutting long hair. This means that there are new things that will change the course of her life. Seeing a long haircut and changing appearance for the better in one girl maneuvers. It indicates an interaction with someone you love or flirting with someone you know while waking up. Ibn Sirin says in a dream his interpretation of cutting hair from short to long in a dream for a single girl. It symbolizes the presence of happy and enjoyable changes in the life of the visionary. See also: Interpretation of a dream about long black hairInterpretation of seeing a dream about cutting hair in a dream for a married womanWhen a married woman sees her cutting her long hair In a dream. The interpretation of the vision falls within the meaning of the bad situation that you are experiencing in reality. It can be interpreted in the sense of seeing a short haircut in a married woman’s dream. Because there is a change in the married woman’s condition to the better. Perhaps this means ending some of the fears that were ongoing. Varies Some dream interpreters see the dream of cutting long hair in a married woman’s dream as an indication of the problems she is going through in married life, and God knows best. While some dream interpreters see the dream of cutting long hair in a married woman’s dream as a sign of her dissatisfaction with life. Which she lives in waking life. The interpretation of the dream of cutting hair refers to the dream of a married woman. It symbolizes a change in her married life from worse to better, God willing. Some dream interpreters say that they see a married woman cutting her hair and she is happy in the dream of a married woman. For reconciliation among themselves, i.e. Between spouses, with the help of Almighty God. Interpretation of seeing a dream about cutting hair in a dream about a man and its meaning. The vision of cutting hair is embodied in the maneuvers of a married man, and it has multiple connotations and interpretations in terms of length and short hair: seeing long hair being cut in a married man’s dream indicates a complete change in life that He lives it. Perhaps a dream about cutting hair in a married man’s dream means that there is a complete transformation in the situation or life that he lives. It has been mentioned in many dream interpretation books that seeing long hair cut to short in a married man’s dream is an indication of a lack of understanding of the captives or a lack of control. The soul of the situations that the dreamer is going through, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. The great interpreters of dreams say about the dream of cutting short hair shorter, but the shape of the hair is beautiful. This indicates the love that the dreamer is experiencing, especially his love for his wife. To see the dream of cutting hair in the maneuvers of a married man, It means following a broad diet

title: Interpretation of seeing chicks in a dream

preview.html: But in reality, this dream carries many meanings that you will see through this article from gptafser.com/. Interpretation of seeing chicks in a dream for a single girl. When a single girl sees chicks, this indicates that he will obtain many of the wishes that he desires and wants with permission. God. It is not good to see live chicks, because they show the provisions that she will find. But she will need the help of someone close to her to be able to get out of this crisis and God knows best. Live chicks in a dream are only a sign of the changes that will happen to her, and it may be a marriage soon. For a single woman, seeing the chicks that they build foretells that she will be able to seize the travel opportunity that will come her way. Or perhaps a job that God knows best. But if she sees in a dream slaughtering chicks, this is a sign of the envy that has afflicted her. She is also surrounded by someone who does not want her well and is holding her back. She must Strengthening it by reciting supplications daily and reading Surat Al-Baqarah daily. Seeing raw chicken in a dream. A warning to the biso that this girl speaks of a woman who has morals. Eating a chicken head in a dream is not good. It indicates the separation or loss of a loved one, for God is Most High and All-Knowing. Eating the legs of a chicken Chicken in a dream is a sign that she is doing wrong things that will leave her dog in the next life. When one girl slaughters chicks in a dream. A sign that she will marry someone she does not know from God, the Most High and All-Knowing. See also: Interpretation of dreams about slaughtered and cleaned chickens. Interpretation of watching chicks in a dream For a married woman: When she sees a cooked chicken in a dream for a married woman. It is a sign for her that she is enjoying a stable life with her partner. There is no good in seeing chicks sold in a dream. Because this dream is considered a warning to a married woman about her neglect of the rights of her children. He must take care of them and raise them, because he asks God about them. For a married woman, seeing uncooked chicken in a dream is a sign that she is living in a state of problems, disagreements, and conflicts within her family. But if the chicken is not raw in the dream, it is a good sign that her home will be filled with happiness and goodness, God willing. You may see uncooked chicken. However, this woman will live in a state of stress due to problems related to her children. Seeing chicks in a dream indicates a married woman. However, she will soon learn about the news of her pregnancy if she has not given birth before. Interpretation of seeing chicks in a dream about a man and its meaningWhen a man dreams He buys a lot of chicken. This indicates that he has a lot of good luck. Eating the head of chicks in a dream, which is not praiseworthy, symbolizes the loss of someone dear to him. Perhaps it is his mother or his life partner, then God is Most High and All-Knowing. If he catches a chicken in In a dream, this is a sign that he will earn lawful money and it will be abundant, God willing. It is not good to see a chicken in a man’s dream. This symbolizes that his wife will suffer from an illness or disease in the coming period, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of seeing jinn in a dream for a woman and a man

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the jinn by Ibn Sirin: Whoever sees the jinn in a dream and starts reading the Qur’an when he sees it, this indicates the presence of many enemies in the life of this dreamer. Whoever sees himself reciting two incantations in a dream and the jinn hears him, this is evidence of good kinship between the monarch and God Almighty. Whoever sees the jinn in a dream In its place is the presence of someone who lurks for the dreamer and wants evil with him. And whoever sees himself marrying a jinn is evidence of sin and immorality. The person who sees the dream of someone who is blessed with a child from the jinn will obtain money that he did not expect. Interpretation of a dream about a jinn for a married woman: If he sees a married man standing next to a group of jeans, This indicates that he is suffering from affliction and illness. Whoever sees that he is talking to a jinn in a dream, this is evidence that there is an evil person in her life who wishes her harm while consulting him. Whoever sees the devil talking to her in a dream, this is a sign of her bad reputation. Interpretation of a dream about a single jinnWhen An unmarried woman sees jeans in her dream meeting inside her home, then this is an indication that some thieves have stolen them. Jeans in a dream for an unmarried woman is evidence of the presence of an evil person in her life. If she sees the genie appearing to her in human form, this is evidence that there is a young man who wants Connection with her. Interpretation of a dream about jeans for a pregnant woman: When a pregnant jinn sees in her dream that she is taking off her clothes, this is evidence that there are disagreements between her and her husband that lead to divorce even though she gave birth. Interpretation of a dream about jeans for a man: When she sees a man in a dream teaching the jinn to read the Holy Qur’an, this indicates the man’s status. High in the world. Whoever sees in a dream that the jinn feels happy, he must approach God and not lag behind in worship. A man who sees himself in a dream standing next to a lot of jeans will lose a lot of money. A dream about a man taking off his jeans is an indication of poverty and bankruptcy that he will find. himself in it after he becomes wealthy. If a man sees that he himself has become mad in a dream, this indicates the extensive diet that he will obtain. And whoever sees that he has turned into a jinn, this is evidence of his evil and wickedness. Add the dream that you would like to be interpreted in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it. .

title: Seeing someone drowning in a dream

preview.html: There is no doubt that every dream has its own interpretation, so we will explain through our website the vision of drowning in a dream, which will be explained in detail.Interpretation of seeing someone drowning in a dream about a single girl. Seeing yourself drowning in a dream refers to an unmarried girl in a dream in the sea or river.In A lost future and unfulfilled ambitions in her future life, and God knows best. Also, seeing an unmarried woman if she is engaged indicates the failure of her engagement, and God knows best. Seeing an unmarried girl drowning in her dream and someone saving her from drowning indicates the imminent path of her marriage and her happiness in that marriage. Seeing her being rescued from Drowning for this girl indicates her success and distinction in the areas of her life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about surviving drowning for a divorced woman. Interpretation of seeing drowning in a dream for a married woman. Seeing drowning in a dream for a married woman in most cases means that it is a bad dream and that God is higher. Female vision for a married / married person drowning in her dream With unpleasant dreams. Seeing a married woman drowning in her dream means that she will face many obstacles and crises in her married life. This vision shows some advice for that woman from a person who is more sober and experienced in this world, and she should follow this advice. Seeing a married woman in her dream indicates However, one of her relatives was drowning and she saved him. It is considered a good vision for her, God willing, so that she will be able to overcome some of the problems she faces in her life, and the extent of the family bond between her and her family. And if a married woman sees someone drowning and saves him from drowning, this indicates that this wife has many duties. , which creates many obstacles and problems in her life. Interpretation of seeing yourself drowning in a dream about a man and its meaning When a man dreams that one of his friends is drowning. This may indicate the presence of some problems and difficulties in his professional and personal life, and God knows best. Seeing a man in a dream means a dream of drowning. To the ability The viewer is trying to pay off his debts that he could not pay at that time. Seeing a person drowning in a dream may indicate the coming of comfort and joy, God willing. It is also the confiscation of worries and worries and the resolution of disputes and problems that the dreamer faced during this period, God willing. When a man dreams that he is being saved Someone in a dream. This indicates that this dreamer has people’s respect and appreciation, and they follow in his footsteps because of his justice and love for goodness, and God knows best. Whoever sees in a dream that he is drowning, this indicates his involvement and drowning in the affairs of his life, responsibilities, and work, and God knows best. When a man dreams of a child A young child is drowning. This indicates that there are some problems and fears, but they will disappear soon, God willing. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about drowning in the sea and death. Interpretation of seeing drowning in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. Seeing yourself drowning in a dream indicates the presence of a pregnant woman. She feels very tired and weak because of her pregnancy and the health crises that are going on. And God knows best. Seeing drowning in a pregnant woman’s dream may indicate that she may face some difficulties during pregnancy and childbirth, and God knows best. Seeing drowning in a pregnant woman’s dream may indicate a difficult period that she is going through. But it will soon pass safely, God willing.

title: Interpretation of seeing my daughter with a young man in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a mother seeing her daughter with a young man? Evidence of the mother’s fear for her daughter. She sees her daughter with a man trying to escape with her? Evidence of the obligation of charity. What is the interpretation of a patient who sees his daughter’s lover at home? Evidence of the deterioration of the patient’s health condition. What does it mean that You see a lover who is pregnant with her daughter? A sign that the child is healthy. What is the interpretation of seeing my eldest daughter? A sign of receiving many benefits in the world. What is the purpose of seeing his daughter away? A sign of power, authority, influence, and a lot of money. Seeing a mother taking her son from her? Cue the whispering mother demons. Interpretation of seeing my daughter with a young man in a dream. If the sleeper sees that his daughter is with a young man who was kidnapped in a dream, this indicates her failure in studying. If a mother sees her daughter with a young man in a dream, it is evidence of the mother’s fear for her daughter. When a father dreams that his young daughter is with a man This is a sign that he has committed sins. Whoever sees his daughter with a young man trying to run away with her, this is evidence of the obligation of charity. A man who sees that his son is with a young man in a dream is a warning to the dreamer to approach his Lord and repent to Him. Also, this vision in a dream may indicate That the dreamer has made many mistakes and needs to correct them. Interpretation of seeing my daughter’s lover in a dream: A father who sees his daughter’s lover in a dream indicates that his daughter’s wedding is approaching, and God knows best. If a pregnant woman sees her daughter’s lover in a dream, this is a sign that she will give birth to a healthy child. While it symbolizes the vision of a man loving his daughter in a dream, the dreamer thinks a lot about his daughter’s wedding. When a sick person sees his daughter’s lover at home, this is evidence of the deterioration of the patient’s health condition. If the mother sees her daughter’s ex-lover, this indicates the mother’s desire to marry her daughter soon. It may This vision in a dream also indicates some problems that the girl may face. A mother sees her daughter in a dream. If the mother sees that her daughter is sleeping in the dream, this is a sign that this daughter will be a support for her mother. But if she sees that her daughter is sleeping on the floor, this indicates that The daughter has a serious illness. While the vision symbolizes the daughter’s recovery in the dream, the worries and sadness that the mother is suffering from will pass. When the mother dreams that she is kicking her daughter with her foot, this indicates her good circumstances. Seeing a mother hitting her daughter in a dream is a sign that the daughter listened to the words of her mother and God. I know. The death of a daughter in a married woman’s dream is a sign of the end of marital problems and disputes. Seeing an old girl in a dream. If the sleeper sees the old girl in a dream, this indicates the arrival of kindness, abundant food, and money. Ibn Sirin showed that seeing an old girl in a dream is evidence of achieving huge profits. While seeing my eldest daughter in a dream symbolizes that she will have many benefits in the world. If an unmarried young man sees an old girl in his dream, this means that he will get married soon, God willing. When an unmarried girl sees a beautiful old girl in a dream, this is a sign that she hears Good news.Also, this vision in a pregnant woman’s dream may indicate that she will give birth to a beautiful child and

title: What you do not know about the interpretation of seeing stars in a dream

preview.html: Stars in a dream and their interpretation by Ibn Sirin. Contemplating the stars that decorate the sky at night brings calm and comfort and makes a person feel a state of comfort and psychological peace, and this dream is in the following lines. Interpretation of a dream about seeing stars in a dreamSeeing stars in a dream has more than one meaning and connotation that varies from one viewer to another. In general, It refers to people who want to help people, advise them, and guide them on the right path. The dream of seeing stars also indicates the dreams and desires that the dreamer wants to achieve, so the vision can be an incentive that pushes him to make more efforts and strive harder to achieve his dreams and aspirations. To see A person in his dream that the stars are burning in the sky does not mean good. It indicates a state of anger that controls the wise and learned people. If a person sees in a dream that he is raising his hand to the sky to take the stars, then this gives him good news of promotion and obtaining a higher position and status than he It was on him, but if he stole it from heaven, then he did. It does not look good, of course, but it indicates a person stealing money or jia. Whoever sees in a dream that he holds the stars in his hands, he will be respected by people, including scholars, because he will be able to acquire abundant knowledge. Whoever sees in a dream that he has controlled the stars and moved them as he wishes This dream brings him good news that he will soon assume power or position. A dispute between the stars in a married woman’s dream indicates the outbreak of strife within her family, whether between the husband and the father or between the children, and the vision may indicate the existence of strife for her between marriage and a stranger. It foretells Catching a star in a woman’s dream means that her son will have an excellent position among men thanks to the knowledge he acquires. Catching a star in a woman’s dream indicates that she will reap a child who will become an important scholar in her old age. Seeing stars in a dream (i.e. eating) does not bode well, it indicates Whoever sees, or whoever eats these stars, is eating other people’s money unjustly, so he must repent and return to God (). Mighty and majestic). Seeing large stars in a dream indicates scholars and scholars in religious matters, but if they are small, it means good people. Seeing stars in a dream symbolizes guidance and repentance at the hands of a knowledgeable person, if the dreamer is disobedient and far from the Creator. As for If the dreamer is imprisoned, then the dream portends the end of imprisonment, the end of sadness, and the approach of comfort if the divine is sad or anxious in reality. What is the interpretation of seeing stars in a dream by Ibn Sirin? According to his interpretation, seeing stars in a dream has many good connotations and meanings, as they portend The dreamer has very good health and more nutrition and may indicate travel. Also, the stars in the dream indicate people of knowledge and understanding such as the Companions (peace be upon them). Seeing stars in a dream of Imam Al-Sadiq According to the interpretation of Imam Al-Sadiq, the dream of a person who sees stars close to him or on his head indicates On the joy and happiness that this person will or will enjoy
